file_content.text: We know you're in there, Cipher Nine.
I've already ordered all SIS forces to withdraw--that building will crush everyone inside. Come out and surrender.
I don't recognize your voice.
Who is this?
This is Harson Nild, director, SIS Core Worlds Operations. I can save your life.
Life as a prisoner of war doesn't sound appealing.
I don't think so.
Better than the alternative.
The Republic doesn't torture its prisoners. You'll be treated well, put on the official POW list. You might even go home some day.
At least I'll be going out a hero--not a traitor.
I'd rather die.
I believe you--but I've already made my choice.
I wish it were that simple.
Cipher, think--
You want me so bad? Come in here yourself.
Cocky scumball. [Disconnect]
[Ignore the transmission]
This is your last chance--life as a prisoner or death under four thousand tonnes of rubble!
Can't fault his pitch. Escape tunnel up ahead.
We've met finer negotiators. There's the escape tunnel.
Kind of him to offer. Where's that escape tunnel, now?
I think I knew him as a junior agent. Shall we escape?
Scanning for the escape tunnel.
